name: Gizmo's Dungeon Rent
description:
Controls:

> W / A / S / D => running
> Alternatively: arrow keys => run
> Q => Summon Servant
> E => tear down the wall / put down the box
> R => Set up the trap

Team: RocRac https://twitter.com/RocRacGames
